page.title: 13Day In The Life.. Page (3)
page.content: At this time,the boarders play table tennis,snooker and other indoor games until supper at 6.30 pm.Night prayers follow at 7.10 pm.Boys are free until 8.30 during which time they can play indoor games,work,read quietly or tidy up their dormitory. At night,after showers,all boys have a set duty to do before the (lights out).In the same way,pupils have a job to do during the day which when done in conjunction with all the other duties leads to a very smooth running and a happy community. At the weekend,some boys take exeats, go for walks or have organised games.A video film is sometimes shown in the evening.Homework is not forgotten at the weekend,however, and boys are also encouraged to write home each week.
